resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105761</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105761</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770199935</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">2D Motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">2D Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">2D Mouvement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">2D Movimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">2D Movimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">2D κίνηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">2.o Movimiento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Learn about velocity and acceleration vectors. Move the ball with the mouse or let the simulation move the ball in four types of motion (two types of linear, simple harmonic, circle). See the velocity and acceleration vectors change as the ball moves.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlernen Sie über Geschwindigkeit und 
Beschleunigung Vektoren. Verschieben Sie die Kugel mit der Maus 
oder lassen Sie die Simulation Bewegung die Kugel in vier Typen 
Bewegung (zwei Typen lineare, einfache Harmonik, Kreis). Sehen 
Sie die Geschwindigkeit und Beschleunigung vektoränderung, wie die 
Kugel bewegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Renseignez-vous sur des vecteurs de vitesse et 
d'accélération. Déplacez la boule avec la souris ou laissez 
le mouvement de simulation la boule dans quatre types de mouvement 
(deux types d'harmonique, de cercle linéaires et simples). 
Voyez le changement de vecteurs de vitesse et d'accélération 
comme la boule se déplace.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprenda sobre vetores da velocidade e do 
acceleration. Mova a esfera com o rato ou deixe o movimento da 
simulação a esfera em quatro tipos do movimento (dois tipos de 
harmonic, de círculo lineares, simples). Veja a mudança dos 
vetores da velocidade e do acceleration como a esfera se move.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Impari circa i vettori di accelerazione e di 
velocità. Sposti la sfera con il mouse o lasci il movimento di 
simulazione la sfera in quattro tipi di movimenti (due tipi di 
armonica, di cerchi lineari e semplici). Veda il cambiamento di 
vettori di accelerazione e di velocità come la sfera si muove.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθετε για τα διανύσματα ταχύτητας και ταχύτητας. 
Κινήστε τη σφαίρα με το ποντίκι ή αφήστε την κίνηση 
προσομοίωσης η σφαίρα σε τέσσερις τύπους κινήσεων (δύο τύποι 
γραμμικών, απλών αρμονικών, κύκλος). Δείτε την 
αλλαγή διανυσμάτων ταχύτητας και ταχύτητας καθώς η σφαίρα 
κινείται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aprenda sobre vectores de la velocidad y de la 
aceleración. Mueva la bola con el ratón o deje el movimiento 
de la simulación la bola en cuatro tipos del movimiento (dos tipos de
armónico, de círculo lineares, simples). Vea el cambio de los 
vectores de la velocidad y de la aceleración como la bola se mueve.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770199935</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Unknown, free to use</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105761</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/2d-motion</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
